More monol prerequsities?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): More monol prerequsities?
By verystrait42 on Thursday, February 19, 2009 - 05:23 pm:

Hey all, I am having some problems with aquiring monol. I didn't even think about unlocking him until after my S+ class grendel had to retire. So I decided I wanted a monol next. I raised a garu to level D, 200+ INT (Just to make sure, because Thorr said his had that). I go to the quarry, the the temple that is supposed to give me the monolith. I have tried doing it where I don't searh the quarry and do search the quarry. Neither seems to work. I search the temple once, usually finding a oily oil or monster toy, then try again, getting lost both times. Could there be a rank requirement not in the guide to get monol? Any help or other monol stories would be appreciated.

By Thorr on Friday, February 20, 2009 - 06:38 am:

I was rather lucky to get it in my first try, as it turns out. It appears to be somewhat random. all I can say is to keep going back.

By verystrait42 on Friday, February 20, 2009 - 05:19 pm:

Thanks, I have raised a mooner (suezo/Sp.) to class A and have gone back numerous times, but still haven't had any luck. I will keep trying, that is really all I can do :).

By verystrait42 on Saturday, February 21, 2009 - 01:29 pm:

Update: I unlocked Zan and Durhan, and then went back to Tapota with the same mooner, and found the monolith on first attempt. Could it be that you need to unlock Zan, durhan and dragon before you can unlock monol? I will be testing this theory soon on my emulator of the game. If anyone has gotten monol before unlocking these then let me know so I don't need to take the time.

By Thorr on Sunday, February 22, 2009 - 11:54 am:

No, I unlocked Monol long before I got those. In fact, Monol was my first unlock.

By verystrait42 on Sunday, February 22, 2009 - 07:04 pm:

Thanks. Seems I was almost throw off by pure coincedence.
